definition: knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs
tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies

sentences.english: The rotor knives are adjusted in a jig outside the machine .
sentences.chinese: 动刀刀具在机外的夹具内调整。

sentences.english: The door cover of the host can be opened for convenience of cutters.
sentences.chinese: 主机门盖可打开，便于检修和刀具的更换。

sentences.english: Knurling is the process of producing a roughened surface by means of a specialized forming tool called a knurl .
sentences.chinese: 是一种专门成形刀具叫滚花轮，将表面制成粗糙表面。

sentences.english: An important part of NC tools is to increase the cutting and feeding speeds.
sentences.chinese: 数控刀具是提高切削和进刀速度的重要环节。

sentences.english: This machine is ideal f grinding various types of turning tool.
sentences.chinese: 该机能用于磨削各种规格的焊接式刀具。

sentences.english: Or do you make cutlery or computers?
sentences.chinese: 或者生产出了刀具和电脑？

sentences.english: Chinese policeman tries to convince a knife-wielding man to release a hostage on a street in Guangzhou, China.
sentences.chinese: 警察试图说服挥舞刀具的男子释放人质。

sentences.english: The cutters have very hard teeth made from special steel or from diamonds .
sentences.chinese: 刀具上有用特种钢或金钢石制造的非常坚硬的齿。

sentences.english: Rotary blade has applied latest V-shaped cutting technique.
sentences.chinese: 转子刀具采用最新的V形切割技术。

sentences.english: When roughing with the insert not peripheral cutting edge.
sentences.chinese: 粗加工时没有使用外切刃带有波纹的刀具。

sentences.english: To improve a tool life in this case, therefore, the flank notch wear must be depressed to generate.
sentences.chinese: 为了提高刀具耐用度，就必须减小后刀面边界磨损。

sentences.english: Alaska Bwana Hunting Knife by Columbia River Knife and Tool.
sentences.chinese: 阿拉斯加布瓦纳狩猎刀哥伦比亚河刀和刀具。

sentences.english: The feasible direction of cutter and the way to adjust it were discussed too.
sentences.chinese: 分析了数控刀具的可行方向和姿态调整的方法。

sentences.english: Diamond is the best material of cutting-tools to cut nonferrous metals.
sentences.chinese: 金刚石是切削有色金属的优选刀具材料。

sentences.english: The door cover of the host can be opened for convenience of maintenance and replacement of cutters.
sentences.chinese: 主机门盖可打开，便于检修和刀具的更换。

sentences.english: Tool lock seat make it easy to change tool.
sentences.chinese: 配备锁刀座，刀具更换方便。

definition: knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs
to edge a knife, scissor, sword etc
